item.title: ER Champ 2024
item.description: I took part in the qualifications for World Escape Room Championship 2024 competition. It was a great experience. Qualifications were online point-and-click game with puzzles. I was a member of PKP team with my friends: Mateusz, Tomasz, and Magda. We managed to solve all the puzzles in 03:40:15 which gave us 35th place. See full results at https://erchamp.com/level/intro/16 It was first time we participated, and we are happy with the result.
